description:
An integrated solar panel lets you enjoy a little off-grid power. The do-everything Fenix line blends smartwatch function with advanced training tools and a backcountry GPS. The S-series use a smaller case that is more comfortable on slim wrists. Every 6 model has a big screen, efficient GPS, and an Elevate heart rate monitor for advanced fitness metrics to daily calorie consumption. The free Connect app pairs your phone to your watch. Download training plans, review activities, receive texts, social media alerts and emails, track the weather and more. The Pro Solar can play music and podcasts, and comes loaded with maps.

  • Power Glass™ solar panel lets you go longer between charges, 3 hours to 25 days longer – runtime is feature dependent
  • Sun gauge displays solar charge status
  • S-series’ smaller case is not only more comfortable on smaller wrists
  • Built-in modes for biking, running, swimming (indoor and out), multisport, climbing (bouldering and route, with selectable grading systems and difficulty), gym (strength training, cardio and elliptical, stair stepping, rowing and yoga), surfing (with SurfLine® integration) golfing (41,000+ course maps), skiing (2000+ ski resort maps) and more
  • North American map data
  • Point of interest navigation
  • Round-trip mapping: choose a distance and get course options that start and stop in the same spot – great for set-distance runs
  • Trendline™ routing uses Garmin user’s route data to find the most popular route
  • Stream and downloand using Spotify (premium required), Amazon Music, and more, or add MP3s from your computer
  • Synched playlists can be updated via Wi-Fi
  • Holds up to 2000 songs
  • ClimbPro™ shows grade, total ascent and current position on an elevation profile
  • PacePro™, set your desired pace, then compare it to your distance splits, the Fenix 6 compares your needed pace vs your goal pace for each split and for the course
  • Body Battery™ tracks daily energy levels, monitoring what drains your energy (exercise) and recharges your energy (rest, food), letting you train smarter
  • Garmin Pay™, make payments with your watch (if supported by your bank)
  • Strava Segment integration, preloaded and on-the-fly (through your phone), lets you know when starred segments begin and shows instantaneous data, comparing it to your PR and the current KOM or QOM, and provides results once complete. (requires Strava premium)
  • LiveTrack, share your location and fitness data during activities (through a phone)
  • Connects to 3 satellite constellations (GPS, GLONASS and Galileo) and caches satellite positions
  • Elevate™ V3 optical heart rate monitor has a red LED for Pulse Ox data and even works while swimming
  • Physiological data: VO2 max, a race predictor, recovery advisor and performance indicator – many take temperature and altitude into consideration
  • 7-day training load lets you know if you're overtraining, under-training, or on the right path
  • Compatible with running dynamics sensors (sold separately)
  • Incident detection + assistance mode sends out a LiveTrack link letting your contacts know where you are
  • 24/7 activity tracking learns your activity level and guides you towards a more active lifestyle
  • Sleep tracking, shows total sleep hours as well as movement and restful sleep
  • Access Garmin Connect app via Bluetooth to your phone
  • Connect IQ allows you to download apps, widgets, templates, data fields and more
  • UltraTrac™ mode reduces the GPS communication to save battery
  • Pre-set and custom power profiles let you maximize your battery’s power
  • ABC data comes in via the internal altimeter, barometer and a tilt-compensated compass
  • In the box: fēnix 6S Pro Solar, charging cable and documentation
name: Garmin Fenix 6S Pro Solar - Unisex
